characters.name: Amber
characters.description: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best - albeit only - Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.
characters.motto: Outrider Amber, at the ready!

characters.name: Barbara
characters.description: Every denizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. However, she learned the word "idol" from a magazine.
characters.motto: The best magic is diligence.

characters.name: Beidou
characters.description: Beidou is the leader of the Crux â€” an armed fleet based in Liyue Harbor. An armed fleet means exactly what it sounds like: a fleet of ships armed to the teeth
characters.motto: I'm the captain, so you can be my first mate! Deal?

characters.name: Bennett
characters.description: A righteous and good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.
characters.motto: Weather's not bad today... Oh crud, I jinxed it! Now it's bound to rain.

characters.name: Chongyun
characters.description: A young exortcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his pure positive energy.
characters.motto: Once I have rid this world of all evil spirits, I... I will break with my abstinence, and go to the host springs!

characters.name: Diluc
characters.description: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.
characters.motto: Eyes forwards, to the new dawn.

characters.name: Diona
characters.description: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredible popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.
characters.motto: Diona, Bartender of the Cat's Tail! I charge a hefty fee for private events... huh? You didn't come here for a drink?

characters.name: Fischl
characters.description: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessia der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.
characters.motto: You are as I am, a traveler form another world.

characters.name: Jean
characters.description: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of the Knights of Favonius in Mondstadt.
characters.motto: Wind, hear me!

characters.name: Kaeya
characters.description: A thinker in the Knights of Favonius with a somewhat exotic appearance.
characters.motto: A knight's duty goes beyond the sword.

characters.name: Keqing
characters.description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Has much to say about Rex Lapis' unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue - but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.
characters.motto: Hmph. Lets be real here, does Rex Lapis really know everything?

characters.name: Klee
characters.description: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius' confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.
characters.motto: I wanna go out and play! Come on, take me out to play already!

characters.name: Lisa
characters.description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius who was deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguised graduate in the past two centuries.
characters.motto: There'll be time for this later... Come sit and chat with me.

characters.name: Mona
characters.description: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title.
characters.motto: Fate is challed as such, for it cannot be changed, nor can it be reversed. It can only but be accepted.

characters.name: Ningguang
characters.description: The Tianquan of Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.
characters.motto: Every Mora counts, down to the very last one.

characters.name: Noelle
characters.description: A maid in the service of the Knights of Favonius that dreams of joining their ranks someday.
characters.motto: Leave it to me! All of it, whatever it is!

characters.name: Qiqi
characters.description: An apprentice and herb-picker Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.
characters.motto: I am Qiqi. I am a zombie. And I forgot what comes next.

characters.name: Razor
characters.description: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.
characters.motto: The wolves are my Lipical. My family.

characters.name: Sucrose
characters.description: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.
characters.motto: And this one is called... Mist Flower Project 3, Version 17, Enlargement Trial.

characters.name: Tartaglia
characters.description: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe". His name is highly feared on the battlefield.
characters.motto: If your plan is to get the best of me... I'm looking forward to watching you try.

characters.name: Traveler (Anemo)
characters.description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

characters.name: Traveler (Geo)
characters.description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

characters.name: Venti
characters.description: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.
characters.motto: Perfec timing, traveler! Tell me - what is your greatest wish?

characters.name: Xiangling
characters.description: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.
characters.motto: Sit anywhere you like. I can make whatever you want, even it it's not on the menu!

characters.name: Xingqiu
characters.description: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.
characters.motto: A moment of solitude. What could be better?
